name: Eternal Collapse
description:
Follow The Cloaked One through The Underground.

This demo is a proof of concept showing the possibility to make levels revolving not around attacking, but rather deflecting and dodging, making the player incapable of doing damage on his own, and making the player rely on the enemy's attacks.

Demo level only to showcase mechanics, and as such has no end.

Controls:

wasd/ arrow keys to move

j/z to shield

the shield deflects bullets when the wind effect blows outward

k/x to dash 

the red frame in the dash is an invincibility frame
